text: Karpoorada Gombe is a 1996 Indian Kannada language romantic drama film directed and written by S. Mahendar. The film stars Ramesh Aravind, Shruti and Shwetha in the lead roles and featured music composed by Hamsalekha.Film cast & crew Actor Sharan made his debut with this film. The film was dubbed and released in Tamil as Akka by RB Choudary with added comedy track of Vadivelu and Chinni Jayanth.https://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=x8G803Bi31IC&dat;=19970322&printsec;=frontpage&hl;=en ==Cast== * Ramesh Aravind * Shruti * Shwetha * Sharan * Lokesh * Srinivasa Murthy * Doddanna * Rekha Das * Ashalatha * Vanishree * Master Anand * Keerthana H S ==Soundtrack== All the songs are composed, scored and lyrics written by Hamsalekha. {|class="wikitable" !
